2nd alarm fires for <a href="https://twitter.com/VanFireRescue" class="PrettyLink profile customisable h-card" dir="ltr"><span class="PrettyLink-prefix">@</span><span class="PrettyLink-value">VanFireRescue</span></a> <a href="https://twitter.com/IAFF18" class="PrettyLink profile customisable h-card" dir="ltr"><span class="PrettyLink-prefix">@</span><span class="PrettyLink-value">IAFF18</span></a> crews this morning was called in just before 5 am.<br><br>Stubborn fire on Main taking considerable efforts to extinguish. No injuries. Under investigation.<br><br>Excellent command &amp; firefighting!<a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/VFRS?src=hash" class="PrettyLink hashtag customisable" dir="ltr" rel="tag"><span class="PrettyLink-prefix">#</span><span class="PrettyLink-value">VFRS</span></a></p> <div class="Tweet-card"> <article class="MediaCard customisable-border" dir="ltr"> <div class="MediaCard-media"> <div class="MediaCard-widthConstraint js-cspForcedStyle"> <div class="MediaCard-mediaContainer js-cspForcedStyle MediaCard--roundedTop MediaCard--roundedBottom"> <a href="https://twitter.com/FireChiefReid/status/1246815460772831233/photo/1" class="MediaCard-mediaAsset NaturalImage"> <img class="NaturalImage-image" width="320" height="240" title="View image on Twitter" alt="View image on Twitter" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/media/EU2UDW6U0AALjmc?format=jpg&amp;name=medium"> </a> </div> </div> </div> </article> </div> <div class="TweetInfo"> <div class="TweetInfo-like"> <a class="TweetInfo-heart" title="Like" href="https://twitter.com/intent/like?tweet_id=1246815460772831233"> <div><div class="Icon Icon--heart " title="Like"></div> </div> <span class="TweetInfo-heartStat">52</span> </a> </div> <div class="TweetInfo-timeGeo"> <a class="u-linkBlend u-url customisable-highlight long-permalink" href="https://twitter.com/FireChiefReid/status/1246815460772831233"> <time class="dt-updated" datetime="2020-04-05T15:02:25+0000" title="Time posted: April 05, 2020 15:02:25 (UTC)">8:02 AM - class="Tweet-body e-entry-content"> <p class="Tweet-text e-entry-title" lang="en" dir="ltr">BREAKING: <a href="https://twitter.com/VanFireRescue" class="PrettyLink profile customisable h-card" dir="ltr"><span class="PrettyLink-prefix">@</span><span class="PrettyLink-value">VanFireRescue</span></a> crews have rescued a man in a wheelchair from a second alarm fire on E 13th ave. <br><br>Fire operations still underway. A number of persons displaced.<br><br>Cause unknown.<a href="https://twitter.com/IAFF18" class="PrettyLink profile customisable h-card" dir="ltr"><span class="PrettyLink-prefix">@</span><span
